text:
In Installing ANT System Requirements it states:
------------
For the current version of Ant, you will also need a JDK installed on your 
system, version 1.1 or later. Some tasks work better on post-1.1 systems; some 
tasks only work on Java 1.2 and successors. A future version of Ant -Ant 2.0- 
will require JDK 1.2 or later, though Ant 1.x strives to retain 1.1 
compatibility. 

Note: The Microsoft JVM/JDK is not adequate on its own, although the MS 
compiler is supported. 
------------------

I think this needs to be revised to exclude JDK1.1 and not to talk about Ant 
2.0.
creator: j_a_fernandez@yahoo.com
